GOOD LOOKS AREN'T EVERYTHING

Images in the gallery are not of the actual product you will receive, but are representational of the condition these refurbished units are generally in. Please note that besides cosmetic flaws, you will receive a 100% functional product.

settings.title: REFURBISHED
settings.content:
Headphone Zone Certified Refurbished Units

Refurbished products are reinstated and restored products that are fully functional with obvious signs of previous use. All refurbished products have to undergo a mandatory 5-step quality assurance process. Since most refurbished products are used, there is a limited warranty period of 3 months. If you receive a defective product, you will be eligible to return it under our 7 Day Replacement Guarantee policy.

5 Step Quality Assurance Process For Refurbished Products


Assembly & Inspection

Post product assembly two divisions are made - used and defective/damaged. Defective products are inspected for possible repairs.

Soundcheck & Feature Check

A Headphone Zone Inspector will check the sound and other functionality of the products. For wireless products, features like gesture controls, pairing and charging are also inspected.

Physical Cleaning

After the sound check, the ear tips are replaced, earpieces are thoroughly disinfected, and the cables are cleaned with rubbing alcohol.

Repackaging

The product is neatly packed. The available supplementary accessories are also packed within the box. Refurbished units may or may not have all the accessories.

Sign off for Stocking

Finally, the Inspector will personally sign off on the stocks. The product is finally added to sellable refurbished stock.

Why Buy Refurbished Headphones?


Save Up To 50%

Available at a considerable discount, refurbished products offer an impressive price to performance ratio.

Professionally Inspected

They are professionally inspected for any defectives. If the defect can be fixed, it is repaired by our in-house experts by replacing a part or reinstalling any drivers.

3-Month Warranty

Each refurbished product comes with a 3-month manufacturer warranty, so rest assured knowing that this refurbished product is covered under warranty.

Signs Of Previous Use

All refurbished units have some signs of wear as they're reinstated and restored from a used damaged or defective condition. You can view the gallery images to access the actual state of the products.

Unbiased Customer Service & Support

One will have same Headphone Zone customer support experience for refurbished products like on new products.

Unchanged Replacement Policy

Received a defective refurbished unit? Return it under our 7 Day Replacement Guarantee policy. If you do not like your gear, we will not be able to accept the return.

{%- style - %} .refurb-description { display: grid; grid-template-columns: 3fr 1fr; padding-bottom: 3rem; } .refurb-description img { justify-self: center; } .refurb-features { display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(15rem, 1fr)); gap: 1rem; padding-bottom: 3rem; } .refurb-features div img { display: block; margin: auto; } .refurb-features-2 { display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr); gap: 1rem; padding-top: 2rem; padding-bottom: 3rem; } .refurb-section { display: grid; grid-template-columns: 1fr 3fr; } .refurb-section img { justify-self: center; height: 100px; } @media screen and (max-width:800px) { .refurb-description { grid-template-columns: 1fr; } .refurb-features-2 { grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr; } } @media screen and (max-width:600px) { .refurb-section { grid-template-columns: 1fr; } .refurb-features-2 { grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr; } } {%- endstyle - %}
